title: dappcreators
author: dappcreators
created_time: August 09, 2022, 05:54:56 PMLast edit: November 06, 2022, 08:12:16 PM by dappcreators
content: Looking for a job.Types of work:DApps, NFT and software, web and mobile app Development:- Website Development, web design- Project Development- Decentralized Application Development- Development of Smart Contracts- PoC Development- NFTs- Game Development- Telegram Bot/Game Development- Whitepaper- Development of custom applications- Product design- Software audit- Blockchain software Development- Ethereum network token and Binance, Solana etc.- Advertising of the project- Promotion of tokens- iOS/Android- Knowledge of English- Listing on the stock exchangeAdvice to businesses around the worldTelegram: https://t.me/block_creator

comments.author: PaulBf1
comments.body: You are a very resourceful man I see.Very impressive set of skills you have there if you ask me.What can't you do ?

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: PaulBf1 on August 13, 2022, 01:19:13 AMYou are a very resourceful man I see.Very impressive set of skills you have there if you ask me.What can't you do ?He is actually looking for a job. He has the skills but needs someone to hire him.Your question of what can't he do is not relevant here as he can do everything written there but waiting to be hired.OP, do you have a portfolio too? Better to share the portfolio to show proof of skills.

comments.author: PaulBf1
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on August 13, 2022, 01:32:55 AMQuote from: PaulBf1 on August 13, 2022, 01:19:13 AMYou are a very resourceful man I see.Very impressive set of skills you have there if you ask me.What can't you do ?He is actually looking for a job. He has the skills but needs someone to hire him.Your question of what can't he do is not relevant here as he can do everything written there but waiting to be hired.OP, do you have a portfolio too? Better to share the portfolio to show proof of skills.How could you possibly not recognize the sarcasm in my reply? I was just saying that this guy has way to many skills to be considered seriously, you are welcome to hire him if you want.

comments.author: dappcreators
comments.body: Have portfolio and I can do everything according to my acquired skills
